para: SingleElementSelect is a selection method that selects &elems; in response to a mouse click in the graphics window when the Skeleton Selection toolbox is active and is set to Element mode. It selects a single &elem;.
skeleton is the &skel; from which an &elem; is to be selected.
points is a of objects. The &elem; closest to the first point in the list will be selected. Any other points in the list will be ignored.

The shift and ctrl parameters govern how the current selection (i.e, the set of &elems; defined by this operation) is merged with the previous selection (the &elems; already selected) to form a new selection, as shown in . They indicate whether (True) or not (False) the shift and control keys were depressed during the mouse click that initiated this command.
